flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Red-Eye, Fill-in, Slow Sync (2), Manual (3 levels)
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Face Detection, Live View, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Tracking, Single, Continuous
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (Auto, Preset: Tungsten, Fluorescent 1, Sunlight, Flash, Overcast, Shadow, Underwater, One Touch WB), Custom White Balance
imageformat: JPEG, RAW, RAW JPEG, MPO (3D), EXIF 2.2, DPOF, DCF
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (2x), No. Of Focus Point (35), Manual Focus ( Live view image is magnified when the focus ring is rotated. (at S-AF+MF or MF mode) )
facedetection: Yes, Max 8 frames of face detection can be displayed
dustreduction: Yes, Supersonic Wave Filter (dust reduction system for image sensor)
operatingsystem: Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP (SP2, SP3), MAC OS X 10.4.11, MAC OS X 10.5, MAC OS X 10.5, MAC OS X 10.6, MAC OS X 10.7
shootingmodes: Scene Select Modes (Portrait, e-Portrait, Landscape, Landscape + Portrait, Sport, Night, Night + Portrait, Children, High Key, Low Key, DIS mode, Macro, Nature Macro, Candle, Sunset, Documents, Panorama, Fireworks, Beach & Snow, Fisheye Conv., Wide Conv., Macro Conv., 3D)
display: 3.0 inch Touch control in electrostatic capacitance type OLED monitor
